uspDescription: Hutchison Maintenance is a trusted cleaning service provider with over 20 years of experience in home, office, and restoration cleaning. Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional results at a fair price, ensuring customer satisfaction. We are insured, bonded, and WSIB compliant, making us a reliable choice for all your cleaning needs.

features.name: Personalized Service
features.description: As a small team of trustworthy employees, we take pride in providing personalized service to our clients. Our owner/operator is actively involved in cleaning, working with the team, or inspecting the job personally, ensuring the highest quality of service.

features.name: Strong Reputation
features.description: We have built a strong reputation with builders and real estate agents for being reliable, trustworthy, and fair. Our clients trust us to deliver exceptional results at a fair price, making us their go-to choice for cleaning services.

features.name: Wide Range of Services
features.description: Hutchison Maintenance offers a variety of cleaning services, including home cleaning, real estate cleaning, post-construction cleaning, and office cleaning. We cater to the unique needs of our clients, ensuring a clean and comfortable environment.
